thread:
"New study finds multilingual models excel at regional knowledge via INCLUDE benchmark 🎯 #AIResearch #LanguageModels"
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.19799
The new benchmark highlights cultural nuances, boosting low-resource language research 🎯🌍 #AIAdvancements
Artificial intelligence models display language-based performance gaps ⚖️🌍 #AIResearch #GlobalAI
Multilingual models excel in related langs but falter in unrelated ones 🌍🧠 #AIResearch #LanguageUnderstanding
The study highlights multilingual evaluation challenges like format errors and instruction language impacts. 🧠🌍 #AIResearch #BenchmarkDesign
